title: 求各位大神帮忙看下这是什么情况。
author: 饼干的末日
txt_content:
本帖最后由 饼干的末日 于 2012-8-4 20:21 编辑 


我玩的是单人游戏怎么突然跳出来这个了内容是
[被服务器中断连接]
[Internal server error ]。



然后再想进的时候出现了下面这段东西。。。 

Minecraft has crashed! 
---------------------- Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Exception in server tick loop
This error has been saved to F:\游戏2\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-08-04_18.53.33-server.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone. --- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 9b2ebc43 --------
Generated 12-8-4 下午6:53 - Minecraft Version: 1.3.1
- Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
- Java Version: 1.6.0_24, Sun Microsystems Inc.
- Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc.
- Memory: 148523976 bytes (141 MB) / 406249472 bytes (387 MB) up to 1070399488 bytes (1020 MB)
- JVM Flags: 4 total; -Xincgc -Xmx1024m -XX:PermSize=64m -XX:MaxPermSize=128m
- Type: Integrated Server
- Is Modded: Unknown (can't tell)
- Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
- Player Count: 1 / 8; [gt['Player'/507744, l='我还活着', x=546.05, y=78.54, z=-1191.30]]
- World 我还活着 Entities: 0 total; []
- World 我还活着 Players: 0 total; []
- World 我还活着 Chunk Stats: ServerChunkCache: 0 Drop: 0 java.lang.NullPointerException
at yz.a(SourceFile:356)
at abg.a(SourceFile:29)
at abd.a(SourceFile:39)
at xm.a(SourceFile:424)
at gp.a(SourceFile:140)
at wk.a(SourceFile:704)
at gp.c(SourceFile:82)
at go.<init>(SourceFile:26)
at gn.a(SourceFile:171)
at gn.a(SourceFile:202)
at et.a(SourceFile:103)
at et.c(SourceFile:138)
at et.a(SourceFile:80)
at axx.b(SourceFile:72)
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.q(SourceFile:452)
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.p(SourceFile:383)
at axu.p(SourceFile:111)
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(SourceFile:316)
at ep.run(SourceFile:539)
--- END ERROR REPORT b1951417 ----------
这个程序的网络连接禁止了也没用。。。

replies.author: pogox
replies.txt_content: 不懂。。。顺便提醒楼主图挂了

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
不明情况，但是我要说，目前单人模式联机最好不要装过度修改MC源文件的mod，最好用原版加小地图什么的。

另外提醒你java得更新了。。。
